tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Reports (
 report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 report_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
 report_date DATE,
 reviewer_id INT,
 INDEX idx_report_name (report_name)
)

CREATE TABLE index_optimization ( 
 index_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, 
 report_id INTEGER, 
 index_type VARCHAR(50), 
 index_date DATE, 
 INDEX(report_id), 
 FOREIGN KEY(report_id) REFERENCES risk_assessment_reports(report_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_reports ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  report_title VARCHAR(255), 
  report_date DATE, 
  report_content TEXT, 
  INDEX idx_title (report_title) 
);

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_reports (
	risk_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	report_date DATE,
	report_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_index (
	risk_id INT REFERENCES risk_assessment_reports(risk_id),
	report_date DATE,
	report_score INT,
	INDEX idx_report_score(report_score)
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_comments (
	comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	risk_id INT REFERENCES risk_assessment_reports(risk_id),
	comment_content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE risk_assessment_history (
	history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	risk_id INT REFERENCES risk_assessment_reports(risk_id),
	history_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
